title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 296.5 - Information statement for employee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 296.5 - Information statement for employee

State Regulations

Administrative Code of the City of New York, § 11-1909; Tax

Law, § 672

Every employer required to deduct and withhold New York

City nonresident earnings tax from the wages of an employee, shall provide an
information statement and, if necessary, a corrected information statement to
the employee in respect of the wages paid by the employer to the employee in
the same manner as provided by the provisions of Part 172 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
296.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
